item.title: Microsoft earnings are coming Wednesday. Here’s what top analysts expect
item.description: Analysts are overwhelmingly bullish heading into Microsoft's fiscal fourth-quarter earnings.

item.title: Peloton rips higher after UBS says the stock could nearly double
item.description: Improving web traffic and cost-cutting measures could boost shares of Peloton higher from here, according to UBS.

item.title: Novo Nordisk gets a downgrade from Bank of America as Wegovy growth outlook weakens
item.description: The bank downgraded the Danish pharmaceutical giant to neutral from buy and decreased its price target.

item.title: Morgan Stanley raises Nvidia price target, cites ‘exceptional’ AI strength
item.description: Analyst Joseph Moore, who reiterated his overweight rating on the artificial intelligence chip darling, upped his price target on the stock.

item.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 pulled back from its record Tuesday as progress on talks between the U.S. and Beijing stalled. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into We...
